summation_rule: Extract balances from both the P&L and Balance Sheet. Debit balances are positive. Credit balances (e.g., Net Profit) are negative and should be presented as positive amounts by flipping the sign (multiply by -1).

additional_instructions: This note covers specific statutory/additional disclosures required under Ind AS. Net Profit (a credit balance) must be sign-flipped for the EPS numerator. The EPS calculation line item should compute the Basic and Diluted EPS (assuming they are the same). All P&L expenses for auditor payments should be extracted directly (Debit balances are positive).
